com.jcabi.http.Request

    Package Description
    com.jcabi.http

    • Uses of Request in com.jcabi.http.request

      Classes in com.jcabi.http.request that implement Request 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ApacheRequest
      Implementation of Request, based on Apache HTTP client.
      class  FakeRequest
      Implementation of Request that always returns the same response, specified in the constructor.
      class  JdkRequest
      Implementation of Request, based on JDK.
